name: kilobyte
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also kibibyte) a unit of computer information consisting of 1,024 bytes: a 20-kilobyte file A standard e-mail consists of ten kilobytes of data.
a unit of computer information consisting of 1,000 bytes: A byte is a single unit of information, a kilobyte is 1000 bytes, and a megabyte is 1000 kilobytes.
More examplesFewer examplesRather than kilobytes, he sends megabytes to gigabytes of data.Data is retrieved from the disc at a rate of 150 kilobytes per second. The first 640 kilobytes are reserved for RAM.
